content: an unstructured stretchy shoulder bag with a knotted strap use any sturdy cotton linen hemp or similar dk yarn wool is not recommended - it would make it super stretchy it can also be worked in a sport weight yarn on smaller needles for a smaller bag italian translation by maria rosa 1 german translation by gabi 2 1 http //www ravelry com/people/mariarosaknits 2 http //www ravelry com/people/aprilherb
